Provenance: Rt. Rev. Herbert Croft, Bishop of Hereford, Croft Castle, Herefordshire (until d. 1691)
Sir Herbert Croft, 1st Baronet, Croft Castle (1691–d. 1720)
Sir Archer Croft, 2nd Baronet, Croft Castle (1720–d. 1753)
Sir Archer Croft, 3rd Baronet, Croft Castle (1753–d. 1792)
his cousin, Walter Michael Moseley, Buildwas Abbey, Iron Bridge, Salop, Shropshire (1792–d. 1827)
his nephew, Captain Herbert Richard Moseley, Buildwas Abbey (1887–1912
